:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''AC1750'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC1750 MU-MIMO Gigabit Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA7300/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA7300|pid=01t340000046qvvAAA}}{{•}} [http://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/userguide/EA7300_UG_INTL.pdf User guide] "BWY00C-1.6MM" is silkscrened on the board image shown. :This would indicate [[SerComm]] manufacture. {{WiFiCert|WFA67654|2016-10-07}} *{{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/ea7300_v1}} ===Product Features:=== *AC1750 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Gigabit (450+1300 Mbps) *802.11abgn/ac, N450 (2.4GHz) + AC1300 (5GHz) *Simultaneous Dual-Band, 3x3 Spatial Streams *Beamforming Technology, Seamless Roaming *Antennas: One (1x) internal antenna (?), :Three (3x) external non-detachable dipole antennas *Guest Access: Supports up to 50 guests, :both 2.4/5GHz bands have a unique Network Name (SSID) *Ports: One (1x) WAN / Internet Gigabit port :Four (4x) LAN / Ethernet Gigabit ports :One (1x) USB 3.0 port with a current draw of up to 1100mA ::Digital Living Network Alliance (DLNA)-compatible ::Virtual printing support, Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) *Switch/Button: One (1x) rocket-style power switch :One (1x) reset push-button to restore factory default settings :One (1x) Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) push-button *Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) 2.0 ===See also=== :;[[Linksys]] *[[Linksys EA9500]] - AC5400 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9500 PPage] *[[Linksys EA9300]] - AC4000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9300 PPage] *[[Linksys EA9200]] - AC3200 Tri-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9200 PPage] *[[Linksys EA8500]] - AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA8500 PPage] *[[Linksys EA8300]] - AC2200 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA8300 PPage] *[[Linksys EA7500]] - AC1900 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA7500 PPage] *[[Linksys EA7300]] - AC1750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA7300 PPage] ==Images== __NOTOC__
